article: Jim Green works in the hospital. Last weekend he  _  go to work. On Saturday morning his father  _  to him, "Jim, go to the city and to see my best friend, Mr. Vickers. Here is his  _  . His home is near the ." Jim went to the city  _  train. He got off the train and thought, "Mr. Vicker's  _  is near the station, I can  find  it easily." But after an hour he couldn't find it.  _  he stopped and asked an old man. The old man said, "Just go along this street,  _  left at New Zoo, and the house is  _  your right." Three weeks  _  , his father told him  to see  Mr Vickers again. He had to  _  someone for the way when he didn't find the house. He stopped the  _  man. He was  _  and said, "Are you still  looking for  that place, young man?"
